TopicTitle: Game Crashing Intermittently, Cant Figure Out why

Log:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1KfvrP_Wsuph4koqlUSG9pmoI0FRNsr52?usp=sharing

Do you mean KSP 1.10.1?

I see a huge number of errors that look like this:  

ERROR: Could not locate model: CxAerospace/Station Parts/Parts/Truss/CXA_P5 while applying KSP_MODEL_SHADER with name of: Stock_FullMetal

at the end of the Player.log, which suggests that something is causing a huge number of errors which crashes the game. The error.log file says there’s an access violation in the unity player; the last time I saw that error was due to an outdated graphics driver so try updating your drivers and see if that fixes it. If that doesn’t work, remove mods that alter appearance like SSTU as that seems to be causing the problem, then run the game again and see if that works.

Hey @jimmymcgoochie thanks.

I think that was an error with Textures Unlimited and Magpie.

I've made a few changes, will see what it does.
